methods.name: pickFiles
methods.docs: Open the file picker that allows the user to select one or more files.

properties.name: path
properties.docs:
The path of the file.

Only available on Android and iOS.

properties.name: data
properties.docs:
The Base64 string representation of the data contained in the file.

Is only provided if `readData` is set to `true`.

properties.name: mimeType
properties.docs: The mime type of the file.

properties.name: size
properties.docs: The size of the file in bytes.

properties.name: blob
properties.docs:
The Blob instance of the file.

Only available on Web.

properties.name: types
properties.docs:
List of accepted file types.
Look at [IANA Media Types](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml) for a complete list of standard media types.

This option cannot be used with `multiple: true` on Android.

Example: `['image/png', 'application/pdf']`

properties.name: multiple
properties.docs:
Whether multiple files may be selected.

Default: `false`

properties.name: readData
properties.docs:
Whether to read the file data.

Default: `true`
